scripts.build-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.build-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/app/src/main/assets/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ios/app/src/main/res
scripts.build-macos: react-native bundle --platform macos --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output macos/app/src/main/assets/index.macos.bundle --assets-dest macos/app/src/main/res
scripts.build-windows: react-native bundle --platform windows --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output windows/app/src/main/assets/index.windows.bundle --assets-dest windows/app/src/main/res
